    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Description : This class is the board class used to draw and discard cards.
    CardInteractions
    Description : This class is used to alter card power values since soldier cards gain power when Figures are on the board.
    CardValues
    Description : This class is used to calculate card values depending on factions, values and power and combine those into a string to display the real name of the card.
    Deck
     
    GameMasterCard
     
    Hand
    Description : This class is the hand class and will be used to retain player cards in hand.
